eventDecorators.name: CurrencyPairSet
eventDecorators.description: Emitted everytime a currency pair is attached to a new price feed contract.

functionDecorators.name: currencyPairId
functionDecorators.description: Helper pure function: returns hash of the provided ERC2362-compliant currency pair caption (aka ID).

functionDecorators.name: getPriceFeed
functionDecorators.description: Returns the ERC-165-compliant price feed contract currently serving updates on the given currency pair.

functionDecorators.name: getPriceFeedCaption
functionDecorators.description: Returns human-readable ERC2362-based caption of the currency pair being served by the given price feed contract address. Fails if the given price feed contract address is not currentlyregistered in the router.

functionDecorators.name: lookupERC2362ID
functionDecorators.description: Returns human-readable caption of the ERC2362-based currency pair identifier, if known.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setPriceFeed
functionDecorators.description: Register a price feed contract that will serve updates for the given currency pair. Setting zero address to a currency pair implies that it will not be served any longer.Otherwise, fails if the price feed contract does not support the `IWitnetPriceFeed` interface,or if given price feed is already serving another currency pair (within this WitnetPriceRouter instance).

functionDecorators.name: supportedCurrencyPairs
functionDecorators.description: Returns list of known currency pairs IDs.

functionDecorators.name: supportsCurrencyPair
functionDecorators.description: Returns `true` if given pair is currently being served by a compliant price feed contract.

functionDecorators.name: supportsPriceFeed
functionDecorators.description: Returns `true` if given price feed contract is currently serving updates to any known currency pair.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: valueFor
functionDecorators.description: Returns last valid price value and timestamp, as well as status of the latest update request that got posted to the Witnet Request Board. Fails if the given currency pair is not currently supported.

parameterDecorators.name: _erc2362id
parameterDecorators.description: Price pair identifier as specified in https://github.com/adoracles/ADOIPs/blob/main/adoip-0010.md.

returnDecorators.name: _lastPrice
returnDecorators.description: Last valid price reported back from the Witnet oracle.

returnDecorators.name: _lastTimestamp
returnDecorators.description: EVM-timestamp of the last valid price.

returnDecorators.name: _latestUpdateStatus
returnDecorators.description: Status code of latest update request that got posted to the Witnet Request Board: - 200: latest update request was succesfully solved with no errors - 400: latest update request was solved with errors - 404: latest update request is still pending to be solved.
